mapper.select: SELECT R_NUM, E_IDX, E_ADDRESS, E_NAME, E_CONTENT, E_STARTDATE, E_ENDDATE, E_UPVOTE, E_REVIEWCOUNT, LAT, LNG, E_REGION, E_TAG, E_COUNT, E_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R_NUM, E.*FROM (SELECT EVENT.* FROM EVENT)E) WHERE UPPER(E_ADDRESS) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%' AND (R_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}) AND E_ENDDATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(E_IDX) FROM EVENT WHERE UPPER(E_ADDRESS) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{key}) || '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET E_UPVOTE = E_UPVOTE+1 WHERE E_IDX=#{e_idx}
UPDATE EVENT SET E_UPVOTE = E_UPVOTE-1 WHERE E_IDX=#{e_idx}
UPDATE EVENT SET E_COUNT = E_COUNT+1 WHERE E_IDX=#{e_idx}
UPDATE EVENT SET E_COUNT = E_COUNT-1 WHERE E_IDX=#{e_idx}
UPDATE EVENT SET E_REVIEWCOUNT = E_REVIEWCOUNT+1 WHERE E_IDX = #{e_idx }
